game.title: Stellar Odyssey
game.summary: Embark on a pixelated journey through deep space, navigating wormholes and facing time dilation to ensure the survival of humanity. Manage your ship, resources, and relationships while unraveling the mysteries of the cosmos.
game.world_setting: In a near-future Earth teetering on the brink of collapse due to environmental disasters, a desperate mission is launched to find a new habitable planet through a mysterious wormhole gateway. Players will explore alien worlds, encounter cosmic phenomena, and grapple with the emotional complexities of connecting with family across vast distances.

main_character.name: Nova
main_character.visual_description: A determined young woman with a space suit adorned with glowing circuit patterns, a helmet with a retractable visor, and a holographic compass on her wrist.

characters.name: Eli
characters.visual_description: Grizzled old astronaut with a cybernetic arm and a rugged spacesuit.

characters.name: Astra
characters.visual_description: Botanist with a green thumb and a gentle demeanor, wearing a plant-covered suit.

characters.name: Rex
characters.visual_description: Slick pilot in a sleek spacesuit with mirrored visor and a competitive streak.

characters.name: Vera
characters.visual_description: Tech-savvy mechanic in a patched-up spacesuit covered in tools and gadgets.

characters.name: Orion
characters.visual_description: Quirky alien botanist in a flower-patterned spacesuit with a penchant for puns.

scenes.title: Crisis on Earth
scenes.setting: In a near-future Earth plagued by environmental disasters, Nova, a determined young explorer, must join a desperate mission to find a new habitable planet through a mysterious wormhole gateway. She is accompanied by a grizzled old astronaut, a botanist healer, a slick pilot rival, a tech-savvy engineer, and a quirky alien comic relief, forming a ragtag team facing insurmountable odds.

scenes.title: Journey into the Unknown
scenes.setting: As the team traverses through the wormhole gateway, they find themselves in uncharted territories of space, encountering strange phenomena and unknown planets. Nova must make crucial decisions that impact the survival of her crew and the success of their mission.

scenes.title: Time Dilation Dilemma
scenes.setting: Facing time dilation effects near a black hole, the crew is forced to grapple with the concept of relativity as time moves differently for each member. Nova must navigate the dangers of warped time while maintaining the emotional bond between her and her distant family back on Earth.

scenes.title: Survival on Alien Soil
scenes.setting: Stranded on a hostile alien planet, the crew must rely on their wits and skills to survive against cosmic threats and environmental dangers. Nova's leadership is put to the test as they face unexpected challenges that threaten to tear them apart.

scenes.title: Final Confrontation
scenes.setting: As the team reaches the climax of their journey, they must confront the ultimate antagonistic force that has been manipulating their mission from the shadows. Nova's decisions throughout the game come to fruition, determining the fate of humanity and the emotional resolution of her relationships.

skills.name: Astro-Navigation
skills.effect: Allows the player to plot a course through space using celestial objects for guidance.

skills.name: Gravity Manipulation
skills.effect: Enables the player to manipulate gravitational fields for strategic advantage.

skills.name: Alien Botany
skills.effect: Grants the player the ability to identify and utilize alien flora for survival and puzzle-solving.

skills.name: Engine Overhaul
skills.effect: Enhances ship speed and maneuverability for evasive actions in combat.

skills.name: Resource Allocation
skills.effect: Optimizes resource distribution for prolonged journeys and emergency situations.

skills.name: Emergency Repairs
skills.effect: Allows the player to quickly repair critical ship systems during crises.

skills.name: Temporal Analysis
skills.effect: Assists the player in understanding and mitigating time dilation effects during missions.

skills.name: Orbital Mechanics
skills.effect: Utilizes precise calculations for optimal trajectory and orbital maneuvers.

skills.name: Quantum Entanglement
skills.effect: Unlocks advanced technology for communication and problem-solving across vast distances.

weapons.name: Photon Blaster
weapons.description: A high-energy weapon that fires concentrated beams of light, capable of piercing through shields and armor.

weapons.name: Singularity Grenade
weapons.description: A grenade that creates a mini black hole upon detonation, sucking in nearby enemies and objects before collapsing.

weapons.name: Plasma Rifle
weapons.description: A versatile weapon that fires plasma projectiles at high velocity, dealing splash damage upon impact.

weapons.name: Quantum Blade
weapons.description: A blade infused with quantum energy, allowing it to phase through solid matter and strike with unparalleled precision.

cutscenes.title: Visions of Home
cutscenes.description: As the crew experiences time dilation near a black hole, Nova starts to perceive fragmented visions of her family on Earth, struggling to maintain a connection across the warped spacetime.

dialogue.speaker: Nova
dialogue.line: I can see them... my family, but they're slipping away. I have to stay focused, but... they feel so distant.

dialogue.speaker: Eli
dialogue.line: Nova, remember, our mission is here. We'll find a way back to them, I promise.

cutscenes.title: Betrayal Among Stars
cutscenes.description: During a critical mission on a volatile alien planet, Rex reveals his true intentions and betrays the crew, putting their lives in jeopardy and challenging Nova's faith in her team.

dialogue.speaker: Rex
dialogue.line: I've had enough of following your lead, Nova. I'm taking matters into my own hands now, no matter the consequences.

dialogue.speaker: Nova
dialogue.line: Rex, what have you done? We trusted you!

cutscenes.title: Reunion at the Edge
cutscenes.description: As the crew approaches the climax of their journey, Nova receives a mysterious signal that leads her to a surreal encounter at the edge of the universe, where past and present collide in a bittersweet reunion.

dialogue.speaker: Mysterious Voice
dialogue.line: Welcome, Nova. You've come so far, but the path ahead is still uncertain. Remember your purpose, remember your family.

dialogue.speaker: Nova
dialogue.line: Who are you? How do you know about my family?
